Editor Three cheers for Carrie Nutts well reasoned balanced and expertly written opinion piece  I would love to see more from this talented and insightful writer PERIOD

Unfortunately I imagine the only reason her substantial and objective piece about the WTO protests was ever published in The Daily is that the regular editorial staff was I suspect downtown at press time smashing windows and assaulting delegates.Eric Hansensenior ACMS hideshow httpuseragentshow Previous article Next article Copyright1999 The Daily University of Washington
